questions.question: In counter flow heat exchangers between two fluids

answers.a: Both the fluids at inlet are in their hottest state
answers.b: Both the fluids at exit are in their hottest state
answers.c: One fluid in hottest state and the other in coldest state
answers.d: Any combination possible depending heat exchanger design

questions.question: A heat exchanger is used to heat cold water (CP = 4.18 kJ/kgK) entering at 12 ºC at a rate of 1.2 kg/s by hot air (CP = 1.0 kJ/kgK) at 90ºC at rate of 2.5 kg/s. The highest rate of heat transfer in the heat exchangers is:
Air can be best heated by steam in a heat exchanger of

answers.b: Double pipe type with fins on steam side
answers.c: Double pipe type with fins on air side

questions.question: Which type of heat exchanger an automobile radiator is?
Which of the following statements is correct?

answers.a: In counter flow heat exchangers, fluids enter and leave at perpendicular ends
answers.b: In cross flow heat exchangers, fluid flow is in the same direction
answers.c: In parallel flow heat exchangers, fluids enter and leave at opposite ends
answers.d: In double pipe heat exchangers, one pipe is fixed concentrically inside a larger pipe

questions.question: In a parallel flow heat exchanger, the two fluid streams hot and cold travel _______

answers.c: initially in the same direction and then in the opposite direction
answers.d: initially in the opposite direction and then in the same direction
